channel.title: Graphviz on West Mountain Dock
channel.description: Recent content in Graphviz on West Mountain Dock

item.title: Graphvizサンプル2
item.description: コード digraph graph_name { graph [ ranksep = 2; ] root -> Child1 [ color = "red" ]; root -> Child1 [ color = "red" ]; root -> Child1 [ color = "red" ]; root -> Child1 [ color = "red" ]; root -> Child1 [ color = "blue" ]; root -> Child2 [ color = "blue" ]; root -> Child3 [ color = "blue" ]; root -> Child4 [ color = "blue" ]; root -> Child5 [ color = "blue" ]; root -> Child6 [ color = "blue" ]; root -> Child7 [ color = "blue" ]; } 出来上がった図 コード digraph graph_name { graph [ ranksep = 2; ] root -> root_child [ color = "red" ]; root -> root_child [ color = "red" ]; root -> root_child [ color = "red" ]; root -> root_child [ color = "red" ]; root_child -> Child1 [ color = "blue" ]; root_child -> Child2 [ color = "blue" ]; root_child -> Child3 [ color = "blue" ]; root_child -> Child4 [ color = "blue" ]; root_child -> Child5 [ color = "blue" ]; root_child -> Child6 [ color = "blue" ]; root_child -> Child7 [ color = "blue" ]; } 出来上がった図

item.title: Graphvizのサンプル1
item.description: コード digraph { graph [ rankdir = LR; ] Ins1 -> Ins2; Ins2 -> Ins1; } 出来上がった図 グラフに与えた設定 rankdir : LR
